question: Homeguard has played an important role in India during incidence of various emergencies such as air-raid, fire, cyclone, earthquake, epidemic, etc. Who among the following is eligible to be recruited as home guard?
option1: All male citizens of India, within age bracket of 18-50 years
option2: All citizens of India, within age bracket of 18-50 years
option3: All graduate male citizens of India, within age bracket of 18-50 years
option4: All citizens of India, who have completed secondary education and fall within age bracket of 18-50 years
answer: All citizens of India, within age bracket of 18-50 years
explanation: All citizens of India, within age bracket of 18-50 years are eligible to be recruited as Homeguards. Home Guards are raised under the Home Guards Act and Rules of States/Union Territories. They are recruited from various cross sections of the society such as doctors, engineers, lawyers, private sector organizations, college and University students, agricultural and industrial workers, etc. who give their spare time to the organization for betterment of the community.
